Name: CC011- Registrar form pdf
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
{#PDF_Top_Logo}
 
 
 

Registrar Services ({case_ref})

Application type
What would you like to apply for {applicationType}
Personal details
{#customer/SF_Sum}
Application details
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Birth')
Are you applying for your own birth certificate? {yourOwn}
@endaf:if
@af:if({yourOwn} = 'no')
What is your relationship to the person? {relationship}
@endaf:if
@af:if({yourOwn} != '')

Details of birth certificate required

Forenames at birth {forenamesAtBirth}
Surname at birth {surnameAtBirth}
Date of birth {dateOfBirth}
Place of birth {placeOfBirth}
Father's full name {fatherName}
Mother's full name {motherName}
Mother's maiden name {motherMaidenName}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Marriage' or {applicationType} = 'Civi')
Are you applying for your own certificate? {yourOwnMarriage}
@endaf:if
@af:if({yourOwnMarriage} = 'no')
What is your relationship to the couple? {relationshipCouple}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Marriage' and {yourOwnMarriage} != '')

Details of Marriage Certificate Required

@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Civi' and {yourOwnMarriage} != '')

Details of Civil Partnership Certificate Required

@endaf:if
@af:if({yourOwnMarriage} != '')
Party 1 Forenames {party1Forenames}
Party1 Surname {party1Surname}
Party2 Forenames {party2Forenames}
Party 2 Surname {party2Surname}
Any other surnames used by either party (if applicable) {anyOtherSurnames}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Marriage' and {yourOwnMarriage} != '')
Date of marriage {dateOfMarriage}
Place of marriage {placeOfMarriage}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Civi' and {yourOwnMarriage} != '')
Date of civil partnership {datePartnership}
Place of civil partnership {placePartnership}
Address of both parties at the time of the civil partnership {addressBoth}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Death')
What was your relationship to the deceased person? {relationDeceased}
@endaf:if
@af:if({relationDeceased} != '')

Details of Death Certificate Required

Forenames {forenames}
Surname {surname}
Date of death {dateOfDeath}
Place of death {placeOfDeath}
Deceased's Occupation {occupation}
Deceased's Home Address {deceasedAddress}
Maiden Name (if applicable) {maidenName}
@endaf:if
Service option
Select the service required {selectService}
Would you like the certificate posted or for collection? {certificate}
Date of application {dateApplication}
"}
